column1: '''Katharyn Crabbe''' ([[1945]]) was Associate Professor of English at [[wikipedia:Sonoma State University|Sonoma State University]]
column2: before taking on the office of Vice President for Student Affairs and Enrollment Management there. She retired in August [[2007]].

column1: At the time of her publication of ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien (Modern Literature Series)|J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' in 1982
column2: Crabbe used F. as middle initial (as in '''Katharyn F. Crabbe'''). In 1988
column3: at the time of her publication of the revised edition of the same book
column4: she had changed her middle initial to W. (as in '''Katharyn W. Crabbe''').

column1: * [http://www.sonoma.edu/university/vp_saem.shtml Katharyn Crabbe] at [http://www.sonoma.edu/ Sonoma State University]
